title: The Marriage of Octavio Farnese and Margaret of Austria
medium: pen and bister wash over charcoal on white paper
provenance_text:
J. P. Zoomer (1641-1724), Amsterdam (Lugt 1511) according to graphite inscription on mount lower right; Charles Rogers (1711-1784), London (Lugt 624) collector's mark on recto lower left; John Thane (1748-1818), London (Lugt 2393) collector's mark on recto lower left; Dr. Henry Wellesley (1791-1866), Oxford (Lugt 1384) according to graphite inscription on mount lower right; Richard Johnson (d.c. 1877), Manchester (Lugt 2216) collector's mark on verso of mount; Herbert Dupuy

LWL September 2015

Under review by CGK

creator.birth_place: Sant'Angelo in Vado (Pesaro e Urbino province, Marches, Italy)
